title: Square root of a number
description: Write a programme to find square root of a number
contentHtml:
Write a programme to find square root of a number

Input  : 25
Output : 5

// Write a programme to find square root of a number

function squareRoot(number){
  return Math.sqrt(number);
}

const number = 25;

console.log("Input  : ", number);
console.log("Output : ", squareRoot(number));

<?php
/* Write a programme to find square root of a number

Input  : 25
Output : 5
 */

$user_input = readline("Input  : ");
echo ("Output  :  " . sqrt($user_input) . "\n")

?>


// Write a programme to find square root of a number

import java.util.Scanner;

public class SquareRootOfNumber {

  public static void main(String[] args) {
    Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
    System.out.print("Input  : ");
    double input = sc.nextDouble();
    System.out.println("Output : " + squareRootOfNumber(input));
    sc.close();
  }

  private static double squareRootOfNumber(double num) {
    return Math.sqrt(num);
  }
}


# Write a programme to find square root of a number

import math


def square_root(number):
    return math.sqrt(number)


number = 25
print("Input  :", number)
print("Output :", square_root(number))


// Write a programme to find square root of a number
using System;

namespace Codinasion.Programme
{
    public class SquareRootOfNumber
    {
        public static void Main()
        {
            Console.Write("Input  : ");
            String input = Console.ReadLine();
            int x = Int32.Parse(input);
            Console.WriteLine("Output : " + Math.Sqrt(x));
        }
    }
}
